attributes.action: Ban the webpage that says "Internet Explorer cannot display the webpage"
attributes.additional_details:
This is the most annyoing page you can see on the Internet. I am getting tired of the Internet making excuses not to show a webpage.
Sometimes the troubleshooter cannot indentfy the problem.
I am thinking that this page should be banned unless it can find the problem. Then maybe the Internet will try harder to find the page people want.
